name: Corona Grocery Run
description:
This is a pandemic! But your mom still asks you to do your grocery run daily. Will you practice social distancing or act willy nilly? Make your choice and decide how you die!

===============Control================

[W/S/Space]: to circle through choices.

[Enter]: to make decision and progress further.

=====================================

PS: This is my first full game. Since I usually have problem with commitment, I decide to join Ludum Dare to force myself to pick up game development. I've yet learnt how to make graphic, animation and sound  so here goes a text based game. The 2 days have been very fulfilling and full of understandings for me. Please go ham on me!

Made with Heaps x Haxe.
